thread.title: Mardan'ın stadyum ve küçük oteline alıcı çıkmadı
thread.title_full: Mardan'ın stadyum ve küçük oteline alıcı çıkmadı

posts.title: Mardan'ın stadyum ve küçük oteline alıcı çıkmadı
posts.text:
Ana Sayfa » Ekonomi 07.11.2017 12:05 Antalya'da 1.4 milyar dolara mal olan Mardan Palace Otel'in 51 milyon TL'lik Sosyal Güvenlik Kurumu (SGK) primi borçları nedeniyle icradan satışa çıkarılan stadyum ve spot oteline alıcı çıkmadı. 
Mehmet ÇINAR / ANTALYA, (DHA) - Antalya'nın Kundu bölgesinde 2009 yılında Azeri asıllı Rus işadamı Telman İsmailov tarafından 1.4 milyar dolara inşa edilen ve 2010'da 'Dünyanın En Lüks Oteli' seçilen Mardan Palace Hotel'e ait Mardan Stadyumu'nun da yer aldığı 74 bin 13 metrekare alana sahip spor kompleksi, SGK'ya olan prim borçları nedeniyle 37 milyon 525 bin lira muhammen bedelle icra yoluyla satışa çıkarıldı. 
28 bin 394 metrekare alana sahip stadyumun yanındaki spot otel bloğu ile personel lojmanının yer aldığı arsa da 38 milyon 275 bin TL muhammen bedel üzerinden satışa çıkarıldı. Satışa çıkarılan spor kompleksinde 4 tribünlü 1 futbol sahası, tek tribünlü 1 futbol sahası ve 2 antrenman sahası yer alıyor. 
SGK Antalya İl Müdürlüğü'nde stadyum ve spot otel için iki ayrı satış ihalesi yapıldı. Saat 09.45-09.50 arasındaki stadyum ihalesi ve 10.00-10.05 arasındaki spot otel ihalesine katılan olmadı. SGK Gayrimenkul Satış Komisyonu tarafından gerçekleştirilen ihaleyi Mardan Palace Hotel'in avukatları da izledi. İhale komisyonundan yapılan açıklamada stadyum için 3 milyon 750 bin TL, spot otel için de 3 milyon 825 bin TL teminat yatırılması gerektiği, ancak iki ihale için de bu teminatı yatıran olmadığı kaydedildi. Her iki ihale de 14 Kasım Salı günü aynı saat ve yerde yapılmak üzere ertelendi. 
SU VE ELEKTRİK KESİK 
Ağustos ayında rezervasyon alımlarını durduran dünyaca ünlü otelin, borçları nedeniyle hem suyu hem elektriği kesildi. Ayrıca bir tur şirketi 465 bin lira alacak karşılığı yaklaşık 2 milyon lira değerindeki 2008 model lüks otomobili haczettirip, yediemin otoparkına çektirdi. Telman İsmailov'un sahibi olduğu AST 1989 Group'un, Türkiye'deki en önemli turizm yatırımı olan Mardan Palace Oteli, 180 bin metrekare alanda konumlu. Yapımı için 10 bin metrekare altın, 500 bin kristal kullanılan Mardan Palace Oteli, İstanbul'un tarihi yapılarından esinlenilerek inşa edildi. Yorumlar 0

thread.title: Podemos Aragón convoca dos puestos de empleo: un periodista y un community manager
thread.title_full: Podemos Aragón convoca dos puestos de empleo: un periodista y un community manager

posts.author: WebAPA
posts.title: Podemos Aragón convoca dos puestos de empleo: un periodista y un community manager
posts.text:
Imprimir Noticia 
La formación política Podemos Aragón ha anunciado la convocatoria pública de varios puestos de trabajo para completar su equipo entre las que se incluyen un puesto como periodista en su gabinete de comunicación y otro empleo como gestor de las redes sociales del partido . En ambos casos se ofrece un puesto a jornada completa, con una remuneración anual de 14 pagas equivalentes a 2,5 veces el salario mínimo interprofesional más un complemento por hijo. 
Para el trabajo como periodista se señalan como funciones gestionar las relaciones entre los medios de comunicación y el partido, realizar notas de prensa y convocatorias y aplicar el Plan de Comunicación de Podemos. Los requisitos incluyen titulación como Periodista, experiencia mínima de cinco años en medios o gabinetes de partidos e instituciones y residencia en la ciudad de Zaragoza. Se valorará también la experiencia en información política y el conocimiento actualizado del mapa mediático aragonés. 
En el caso del puesto como community manager las funciones incluyen gestionar las redes sociales de todo el partido, la web oficial y la comunicación interna y aplicar el Plan de Comunicación. Se requiere titulación como Community y experiencia profesional mínima de un año y son méritos valorables la titulación como periodista y los conocimientos de diseño gráfico, diseño web, edición de vídeo y grafismo. No se exige la residencia en Zaragoza capital. 
Los interesados deben enviar su currículo y una carta de motivación al correo electrónico seleccion@aragon.podemos.info, con la referencia “Periodista” o “Community Manager” hasta el día 13 de noviembre. Se puede consultar la convocatoria en la web del partido.

thread.title: AKU DAN DIET..
thread.title_full: AKU DAN DIET..

posts.author: Ym.Bundle (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: AKU DAN DIET..
posts.text:
salam.. 

Last entry bulan February lepas, aku ada tulis pasal kisah aku berhenti merokok.. yes, sampai sekarang dah masuk bulan November ni pon aku masih lagi tak merokok balik dan maksudnya program berhenti merokok aku telah berjaya..

Walaupon temujanji klinik berhenti merokok tu masih lagi ada sampai sekarang ni, tapi takda lagi cerita tentang nikotin, rokok dan sebagainya, bila dah masuk stage macam aku ni, mereka ni buat ujian pulak tengok kesihatan aku macam mana lepas berhenti merokok sekian-sekian masa..

Masa ujian darah pertama after 3 bulan aku berjaya berhenti merokok, result darah aku ok la, gula, kolestrol, tekanan darah cantik..tah macam mana plak masuk 6 bulan punya check up, tang kolestrol pulak naik..dan pendekkan cerita, lepas yang terbaru ni, makin naik lagi kolestrol aku...siot betul..

Ni tak lain tak bukan mesti sebab aku tak merokok la ni kolestrol aku naik..hahaha..ok,jangan percaya...aku pon tak tau la nak cakap macam mana..berat aku pon dah naik sikit..yang paling risau perut tu yang makin kedepan..serius tak boleh blah..sebab berhenti merokok ni buat aku kuat makan kot..ntah la..

Bila dapat info kolestrol dan kesan-kesan kolestrol tinggi ni agak bahaya dan sememangnya kolestrol aku dah tahap berbahaya, aku jadi tak tentu arah dowh..terus aku ambil keputusan nak diet ni..tapi tahukah anda yang nak diet turunkan berat badan ditambah plak nak diet untuk turunkan kolestrol merupakan satu penyeksaan yang terlalu kejam...

Aku tak tau karnivor macam aku ni nak makan apa..

Mujur la Dr.google sentiasa ada untuk aku rujuk dan aku masih belajar nak kurus ni..actually aku ni takda la gemuk mana, serius, dengan ketinggian aku plus berat aku yang paling berat penah dicatatkan seberat 61 kg ni kira ok la, seluar pon still 29..memang tak gemuk mana la kan..

Tapi bila perasan kurus dan sihat dan kau makan segala tok nenek makanan kolestrol tinggi, dan tak sedar metabolisme orang yang hampir tua ni tak hebat mana, maka masa itulah baru rasa menyesal tak peduli pasal nutrein yang kita makan..

Apa pon, korang jangan salah anggap plak, bukan makanan yang menyebabkan korang boleh jatuh sakit tu, salah tu tang akidah..ingat la, Allah yang segala-galanya bagi kita kesihatan baik atau tak baik..tu kadang -kadang kita rasa macam tak adilkan, orang tua gemuk minum manis tak ingat dunia, tapi dia bebas dari kencing manis., makan macam-macam kolestrol ok..contoh depan mata aku pon ada.tapi nak buat macam mana, tu la kuasa Allah, tu DIA punya kerja..

Beberapa minggu yang lepas aku dah mula diet sebenarnya dan alhamdulillah, setakat ni ada nampak perubahan.. dari 61 kg sekarang dah 58 kg dan aku target berat aku mesti turun sampai ke 54-55 dalam masa sebulan dua ni..perut pon dah turun sikit kan..tu yang penting sekali..hahaha..aku benci perut boroi sebab tak comel dan nampak tua..hahaha..

Tentang diet yang kejam bila karnivor diberi sayur ni, aku ambil keputusan, cuba yang termampu jela elakkan makanan kolestrol tinggi ni..kalau setakat nasi tu aku dah boleh jer hidup sekarang takda nasi..tapi tanpa lauk kau nak makan apa haa!!.



  ni antara menu diet aku..belasah jer.. 

So diet aku yang main hentam je ni  ialah, aku tolak karbohidrat je dulu..nasi, roti, mee dan sejenis dengannya ni semua kalau boleh aku tak nak langsung ambil..skarang ni aku kenyang dengan protien jer..aku bedal dada ayam, ikan dengan buah2 jer la sekarang ni..nak makan protein dari udang, sotong tak berani plak sebab kolestrol tinggi..

Nak diet menu telur rebus pon rugi sebab tak boleh makan kuning telur..kalau orang biasa takpa la, aku kategori kena pantang kuning telur sebab kolestrol dia sangat tinggi..tu yang aku cakap, diet aku ni kejam.menu yang boleh dalam diet biasa, jadi tak boleh kat aku sebab kandungan kolestrol dia..mujur takda darah tinggi dengan kencing manis, kalau tak, nak diet apa pon aku tak tau..

Terkini, aku baru je baca tadi, aku nak cuba kira kalori pulak yang aku makan walaupon rasanya ikut diet aku, kalori agak rendah..tapi takpa la, kita belajar dan cuba paham lebih apa yang aku dah buat ni kan..secara ringkasnya, nak makan lebih, kena bersenam lebih untuk bakar lemak..

Sebagai contoh ni la kalori yang dah banyak berlemak dalam badan aku selama ni..now masa untuk buang segala lemak-lemak tersimpan tu..



Berapa banyak kalori selalunya orang dewasa ambil dalam sehari?  
a) Sarapan Pagi =  541 kalori Nasi lemak bersambal (400 kalori)
Telor mata kerbau (21 kalori)
Teh Tarik (120 kalori) 
b) Minum Pukul 10 pagi = 410 kalori Kuih karipap 3 biji (390 kalori)
Teh O (20 kalori) 
c) Makan tengahari = 900 kalori Nasi 3 cawan (420 kalori)
Ayam kari (250 kalori)
Dalca Sayur setengah cawan (150 kalori)
Jus Tembikai (80 kalori) 
d) Minum petang = 510 kalori Kopi susu (120 kalori)
Popia Goreng 3 biji (390 kalori) 
e) Makan Malam = 682 kalori Nasi 3 cawan (420 kalori)
Ikan Tenggiri Masak Merah (142 kalori)
Kangkong belacan (120 kalori) Jumlah keseluruhan dalam sehari : 541 + 410 + 900 + 510 + 682 =  3043 kalori 

Tu haa kau, rasanya  sepanjang beberapa bulan lepas, kalori yang aku ambil mungkin lebih dari itu untuk sehari pon ada, tu pasal tetiba jer aku rasa aku jadi gemuk sedangkan kalori yang sepatutnya aku ambil dalam sehari cuma 1420 jer..so bila kalori yang tak diperlukan badan tu tak dibakar jadi tenaga, tu yang naik lemak tu...hahaha.. 

CARA MENGIRA KALORI YANG DIPERLUKAN OLEH TUBUH SETIAP HARI: UNTUK WANITA:  
~BMR = 655 + (9.6 x berat badan(kg)) + (1.8 x tinggi(cm)) - (4.7 x umur)
~lepas tu BMR ni kena darabkan dengan DCR
~DCR adalah seperti berikut:
-untuk individu yang kurang senaman/tak senaman langsung/buat kerja pejabat = 1.2
-untuk yang aktif sikit2/senaman 1-3 kali seminggu = 1.375
-untuk yang aktif /senaman 3-5 kali seminggu = 1.55
-untuk yang sangat aktif/senaman 6-7 kali seminggu = 1.725
-untuk yang terlampau dan teramat aktif/kerja dan senaman berat setiap hari/senaman 2 kali sehari = 1.9 contoh pengiraan kalori yang diperlukan oleh seorang wanita:
berat:70kg,tinggi 150cm,umur 20 tahun,kurang senaman/kerja kat opis ja:
655 + (9.6 x 70) + (1.8 x 150) - (4.7 x 20) x 1.2 = 1484.2
jadi kalori yang diperlukan oleh wanita di atas ni adalah 1484.2 sahaja sehari...kalau dia nak turunkan berat tolak lah 500 kalori,kalau dia nak tambah berat dia kenalah makan lebih dari 1484.2 kalori tu....mudah ja nak kira kan? 
UNTUK LELAKI:
~BMR = 66 + (13.7 x berat(kg)) + (5 x tinggi(cm)) -(6.8 x umur) x DCR(DCR sama macam yang dinyatakan di atas) 

ok la, sekian info untuk kali ni..nanti kalau aku dah kurus, aku tulis lagi dalam next entry..choww.
assalammualaikum..

posts.author: Nidia Zuraya
posts.title: Wajahnya Dicatut Alexis, Model Widuri Datangi Polda Metro
posts.text:
17 WIB Wajahnya Dicatut Alexis, Model Widuri Datangi Polda Metro Rep: Rahmah Sulistya/ Red: Nidia Zuraya Republika/Mahmud Muhyidin Gedung Hotel Alexis, Jakarta, Selasa (31/10). 
REPUBLIKA.CO.ID, JAKARTA -- Sebuah akun yang menyebarluaskan katalog perempuan yang disebut sebagai model Alexis, dilaporkan oleh salah satu model yang fotonya dicantumkan dalam katalog itu. Model tersebut adalah Widuri Agesty, dengan didampingi kuasa hukumnya, Krisna Murti.Kedatangan kami hari ini, saya sebagai kuasa hukum Widuri melaporkan sebuah akun yang menyebarluaskan yang kita sebut saat ini katalog Alexis. Dimana dicantumkan beberapa foto Widuri yang seakan-akan Widuri dipekerjakan di Alexis, papar dia di Sentra Pelayanan Kepolisaian Terpadu (SPKT) Mapolda, Selasa (7/11).Krisna melaporkan beberapa akun dengan tuduhan pelanggaran Undang-Undang ITE. Hasil laporan ini, nantinya ada beberapa akun dan akan dicari oleh penyelidik atas terlapornya sebuah akun tersebut, karena ini tersebar luas di Instagram.Menurut Krisna, pihak Alexis diyakini bukanlah penyebar katalog itu, karena yang menyebarkan adalah akun. Ada beberapa iklan menghentikan kontrak dengan Widuri dan ada juga yang inggin klarifikasi terkait hal ini, ini kan merugikan Widuri. Jadi biarkan proses hukum yang berjalan, kata dia lagi.Sebelumnya, sebuah akun yang dilaporkan Krisna adalah akun Ucil, diduga menyebarkan katalog Alexis untuk pertama kali. Namun, untuk identitas terlapornya masih dalam penyelidikan pihak kepolisian.

thread.section_title: Mauritius business
thread.title: Paradise Papers: « La FSC se penche sur le dossier » selon Sudhir Sesungkur
thread.title_full: Paradise Papers: « La FSC se penche sur le dossier » selon Sudhir Sesungkur

posts.author: Le Mauricien
posts.title: Paradise Papers: « La FSC se penche sur le dossier » selon Sudhir Sesungkur
posts.text:
Sudhir Sesungkur a relevé que Maurice et plusieurs centres financiers dits offshore (19 au total) sont mentionnés dans le dossier des Paradise Papers, faisant ressortir que malgré les précautions prises les centres offshore ne sont pas infaillibles. Au niveau de la FSC, a-t-il souligné, il y a un système de contrôle et de surveillance bien rodé qui a été mis en place et que les autorités veulent toujours améliorer. Cependant, a observé le ministre, il est pratiquement impossible d’éliminer toutes les failles dans un système. Sudhir Sesungkur a soutenu que dans les cas où il y a eu des « voluntary misrepresentations » ou des déclarations erronées faites aux autorités compétentes, des enquêtes ont été ouvertes sans tarder. Le ministre a fait référence à un cas spécifique : celui du CEO de Quantum Global, Jean Claude Bastos, qui, selon un quotidien suisse, n’aurait pas donné les renseignements appropriés sur son profil. Un permis d’opération dans le secteur financier mauricien avait été accordé à Quantum Global en 2014.
La FSC se penche également sur un rapport jugé défavorable sur la branche mauricienne de la firme de légistes Appleby qui a été sévèrement blâmée dans un récent jugement rendu par la Cour de Jersey dans l’affaire Crociani. Des fuites de plusieurs milliers de documents de la firme Appleby ont été rendues publiques dans le cadre des Paradise Papers. Le rôle joué par cette société, présente dans plusieurs centres financiers dont celui de Maurice, dans la conclusion des opérations de certains de ses clients a été mis en exergue dans le document publié par l’International Consortium of Investigative Journalists en collaboration avec le journal allemand Suddeutsche Zeitung et une centaine d’agences d’informations.
Sesungkur : « La FSC étudie les données impliquant Maurice »
Joint au téléphone ce matin, le ministre des Services financiers et de la bonne gouvernance, Sudhir Sesungkur, a affirmé s’être entretenu avec les responsables de la Financial Services Commission (FSC) ce matin et que le régulateur des services financiers compte étudier les implications pour Maurice des Paradise Papers Leaks, publiés ces derniers jours. « Il n’y a aucun centre financier au monde qui est à l’abri de tels problèmes. Ces documents n’éclaboussent pas uniquement Maurice mais beaucoup d’autres centres financiers à travers le monde. Les objectifs de mettre une plateforme saine à 100 % restent utopiques », nous a déclaré le ministre.
Text by Le Mauricien

Kazada, ilk belirlemelere göre 1 kişi öldü, çok sayıda kişi yaralandı.

posts.author: 小那件好像
posts.text:
说客英语收费价格是根据具体课程来定的，有月卡、次卡、等多种收费方式。具体情况如下：
1 、说客英语一节课为 25 分钟，早上 6 点到晚上 23 点都可以预约上课
2 、预约需要提前至少一个小时，已预约的课程，至少提前 2 小时取消，若未在 2 小时前取消预约，则课时不予补回。
3 、网上自助预约，不设人工预约和取消预约服务。
4 、有效期每月按 30 天计算。次卡超过有效期后次卡内未使用的课时作废，有效期不能延长。月卡有效期内每天可预约多节课但每天至少须预约一节课，若当天未上课，也会扣掉一个课时，过期不补。
5 、预约老师每节课扣除 1-3 个课时不等，具体以预约课程时，扣除课时数提示信息为准。

thread.section_title: Platform Tech @ Forex Factory
thread.title: Most accurate ZigZag indicator?
thread.title_full: Most accurate ZigZag indicator? @ Forex Factory

posts.author: pips4life
posts.text:
Hi Nicholishen,
I too am searching for a better zigzag, for the main purpose of using the past pivots to draw useful objects, like Pitchforks, Fibos, channels, etc.
I'm looking for an algorithm that:
* detects engulfing bars and counts both the H/L as pivots (and determine the order H-L or L-H)
(I see that the ProfessionalZigZag does so, and that's an improvement over zigzag).
* I'm also interested in capturing fast, but "high" percentage retracement moves, in addition to the time-based zigzags. In other words, a swing could be determined by #bars, and/or by the magnitude of a swing. This is the most difficult concept to clearly define for an algorithm, but "I know it when I see it". Basically, if you have a decent size swing, if you look at how many pullbacks occurred along the way, and how big were they, then pick out the 2-3 biggest ones that are of a more-or-less similar size (in pips), and NOT just trivial compared to the total swing, then I would want a "zigzag" to mark each of the biggest pullbacks. Some of the marked swings would be caught by "time", but for other fast moves, only by retracement size/magnitude. (Any ideas?)
* I'm interested in a multi level semaphore, even 7-10 levels would be great. For example: "4;12;33;89;230;550;1370" (nothing rigid about these choices, but they obviously cover a "MTF" perspective).
* Whether it calculates using only the current timeframe, or makes use of higher-timeframe-data for the longer periods, doesn't matter so long as it's fast enough. (The mzz9.mq4 is an example that can look at higher-timeframe-data to find the highest degree pivots, presumably faster that at the current degree).
For time-only based zigzag algorithms, which nearly all are (that I've found anyway), one approach I attempted -- without success yet -- was to first run the shortest period to find all those pivots. Then, for the next-longest period, I tried to run again, but skip all the bars which were not a lower-degree pivot. Instead, *only* consider those bars which have an existing lower-level pivot, reasoning that it is impossible to have a highest(longest period) pivot which doesn't have every lower-degree as a pivot also. The code I tried came from UniZigZagSemaphore_v4, but its algorithm is only suitable for looking at every single bar, so my approach didn't work. Far too slow unless one can speed things up based on existing lower-degree pivots.
* Finally, for the MTF result, I'm using a single extra buffer to store a bitwise representation of all degrees, using 3 bits for each degree. (Basically, pivotH, or pivotL, or doubleLH, or doubleHL, possibly 1-2 bits more to tag additional criteria). The single buffer should make it easier for other indicators to access all degrees of pivots using a single iCustom.
(Attached is mzz9.mq4, but with Google translated Russian-to-English for the comments. Some are helpful, some are poor translations. Better than Russian unless you know Russian. I might try to adapt the algorithm if I can wrap my head around it, but I don't think it works for engulfing bar double-pivots. Maybe combine the two, plus the semaphore code??). Attached File mzz9.mq4 69 KB | 24 downloads

posts.title: (USA-NC-Monroe) Surgical Technologist I/Maternity Center/CHS Union/PRN
posts.text:
Carolinas Healthcare System Surgical Technologist I/Maternity Center/CHS Union/PRN in Monroe , North Carolina 
Surgical Technologist I/Maternity Center/CHS Union/PRN 
Apply now » 
Location: Monroe, NC, US, 28110 
Company: Carolinas HealthCare System 
Department Name: NSG - Maternity Center 
Location: CHS Union 
Location Details: 
Job Summary 
The Surgical Technologist I applies surgical technology skills to assist in providing patient care in the surgical suite. The Surgical Technologist I assists in maintaining a safe work environment and performs all related job responsibilities. The Surgical Technologist I maintains clinical competencies as appropriate to the ages, developmental stages and special needs of the patients served. 
Essential Functions 
Coordinates the multidisciplinary activities required to provide the highest standard of care for the perioperative patient including providing a safe environment for the patient. 
Assists in obtaining and organizing supplies and instruments prior to the surgical procedure. 
Assists Registered Nurse circulator in preparation of patient, assembly of supplies, instruments and equipment as well as proper disposition of all specimens. 
Performs surgical scrub duties, sponge, instrument and needle counts according to department policy and procedure. 
Provides the surgeon with appropriate instruments, supplies and equipment in a timely manner. 
Monitors and maintains sterility of surgical field according to departmental policy. 
Assists with all aspects of room turnover and instrument/equipment processing. 
Assists with positioning of the patient according to departmental policy. 
Monitors and maintains surgical supplies for sterility of surgical field according to department policy. 
Monitors and documents sterilization activities for completion and accuracy according to departmental policy/guidelines. 
Physical Requirements 
Works inside with occasional intermittent noise and exposure to conditions such as dust, fumes and chemicals. Handles equipment and monitors supplies. Strenuous physical effort will require he/she walk, stretch, bend, climb stairs, twist and squat or kneel while performing multiple tasks. May have lengthy periods of standing. Requires frequent use of side vision, lifting, pushing and pulling. Must be able to lift and support the weight of 51 pounds in handling patients and medical equipment/supplies. 
Education, Experience and Certifications 
High school diploma or GED preferred. Graduate of an accredited school of surgical technology program. Basic Life Support for Healthcare Provider (BLS HCP) from AHA required. 
At Carolinas HealthCare System, our patients, communities and teammates are at the center of everything we do. Our commitment to diversity and inclusion allows us to deliver care that is superior in quality and compassion across our network of more than 900 care locations. 
As a leading, innovative health system, we promote an environment where differences are valued and integrated into our workforce. Our culture of inclusion and cultural competence allows us to achieve our goals and deliver the best possible experience to patients and the communities we serve. 
Posting Notes: Not Applicable

thread.title: In Seoul, Trump calls for North Korea to "make a deal" - FederalNewsRadio.com
thread.title_full: In Seoul, Trump calls for North Korea to "make a deal" - FederalNewsRadio.com

posts.title: In Seoul, Trump calls for North Korea to "make a deal" - FederalNewsRadio.com
posts.text:
November 7, 2017 4:26 am 5 min read Share 
SEOUL, South Korea (AP) — President Donald Trump, on his first day on the Korean peninsula, signaled a willingness to negotiate with North Korea to end its nuclear weapons program, urging Pyongyang to “come to the table” and “make a deal.” 
In a notable shift from his aggressive rhetoric toward North Korea, Trump took a more optimistic tone Tuesday, suggesting that “ultimately, it’ll all work out.” And while he said the United States would use military force if needed, he expressed his strongest inclination yet to deal with rising tensions with Pyongyang through diplomacy. 
“It makes sense for North Korea to come to the table and make a deal that is good for the people of North Korea and for the world,” Trump said during a news conference alongside South Korean president Moon Jae-in. “I do see certain movement.” 
Trump said he’s seen “a lot of progress” in dealing with North Korea though he stopped short of saying whether he wanted direct diplomatic talks. 
Sponsored Survey: Agency managers view cost, security and analytics as criteria for adopting new data storage technologies. Advertisement 
Trump also underlined the United States’ military options, noting that three aircraft carrier groups and a nuclear submarine had been deployed to the region. But he said “we hope to God we never have to use” the military options. 
During his first day in South Korea, Trump lowered the temperature on his previously incendiary language about North Korea. There were no threats of unleashing “fire and fury” on the North, as Trump previously warned, nor did the president revive his derisive nickname for North Korean dictator Kim Jung Un, “Little Rocket Man.” 
But he did decree that the dictator is “threatening millions and millions of lives, so needlessly” and highlighted one of the central missions of his first lengthy Asia trip: to enlist many nations in the region, including China and Russia, to cut off Pyongyang’s economic lifeblood and pressure it into giving up its nuclear program. 
Moon, who has been eager to solidify a friendship with Trump, said he hoped the president’s visit would be a moment of inflection in the stand-off with North Korea and said the two leaders had “agreed to resolve the North Korea nuclear issue in peaceful manner” that would “bring permanent peace” to the peninsula. 
“I know that you have put this issue at the top of your security agenda,” said Moon. “So I hope that your visit to Korea and to the Asia Pacific region will serve as an opportunity to relieve some of the anxiety that the Korean people have due to North Korea’s provocations and also serve as a turning point in resolving the North Korean nuclear issue.” 
When presidents travel overseas, every word is parsed and every action studied. That scrutiny will be intensified in South Korea, Trump’s second stop on his lengthy Asia trip, where he will try to reassure Seoul while risking antagonizing Pyongyang. Trump has suggested that even while in range of Pynogyang’s missiles, he will not change his inflammatory rhetoric, which has included deriding Kim Jong Un as “Little Rocket Man.” 
He began with a visit to Camp Humphreys, a joint US-Korean military base, but even as he walked among the weapons of war, he struck a hopeful note, saying: “it always works out.” 
Much like he did in his visit to Japan, Trump indicated he would place the interlocking issues of security and trade at the heart of his visit. He praised South Korea for significant purchases of American military equipment and urged the two nations to have more equitable trade relationship. Moon said the two agreed on lifting the warhead payload limits on South Korean ballistic missiles and cooperating on strengthening South Korea’s defense capabilities through the acquisition or development of advanced weapons systems. 
Trump also pushed his economic agenda, saying that the current US-Korea trade agreement was “not successful and not very good for the United States.” But he said that he had a “terrific” meeting scheduled on trade, adding, “hopefully that’ll start working out and working out so that we create lots of jobs in the United States, which is one of the very important reasons I’m here.” 
At Camp Humphreys, Trump shook hands with American and Korean service members and sat with troops for lunch in a large mess hall U.S. and South Korean officials have said the base visit was meant to underscore the countries’ ties and South Korea’s commitment to contributing to its own defense. Burden-sharing is a theme Trump has stressed ever since his presidential campaign. 
But Trump is skipping the customary trip to the demilitarized zone separating north and south — a pilgrimage made by every U.S. president except one since Ronald Reagan as a demonstration of solidarity with the South. Trump has not ruled out a military strike and backed up his strong words about North Korea by sending a budget request to Capitol Hill on Monday for $4 billion to support “additional efforts to detect, defeat, and defend against any North Korean use of ballistic missiles against the United States, its deployed forces, allies, or partners.” 
The other question looming over the visit is Trump’s relationship with Moon, with whom he does not nearly share the close friendship he has with Abe. 
Trump and Moon agree on the need to pressure the North with sanctions and other deterrence measures. But Trump has threatened to “totally destroy” the North, if necessary, repeatedly insisted that all options are on the table and suggested that Moon was being too lenient on the north. Moon, meanwhile, favors dialogue as the best strategy for defusing the nuclear tension and vehemently opposes a potential military clash that could cause enormous casualties in South Korea. 
But Moon played the gracious host Tuesday. Following the example set by Japan and other countries that have welcomes Trump with lavish greetings, Moon rolled out an elaborate greeting for the president, including an elaborate ceremony featuring colorful costumes and flags at South Korea’s stately presidential residence known as the Blue House. And he made a point of saluting the recent gains of the U.S. stock market, a favorite Trump talking point, and congratulating the president ahead of the one-year anniversary of his election. 
Trump smiled broadly. 
Associated Press writers Ken Thomas and Catherine Lucey contributed reporting from Washington. 
___

नोटबंदी का एक वर्ष: क्या पाया, क्या खोया Nov 7, 2017 12:15 IST Gorky Bakshi 
आज से ठीक एक वर्ष पहले 08 नवंबर 2016 को जब प्रधानमंत्री नरेंद्र मोदी ने 500 रुपये एवं 1000 रुपये के नोटों को तत्काल प्रभाव से बंद किए जाने की ऐतिहासिक घोषणा की उस समय पूरे देश में खलबली सी मच गयी थी. उस समय की शुरुआती परेशानियों के बावजूद देश फिर से धीरे-धीरे पटरी पर आने लगा है.हालांकि, नोटबंदी से भारतीय अर्थवयवस्था को काफी परेशानी भी झेलनी पड़ी. इस फैसले से पिछले एक वर्ष के दौरान जहां देश के विकास की रफ़्तार सुस्त रही, वहीं रोजगार, विनिर्माण तथा विदेशी निवेश पर भी गहरा प्रभाव पड़ा. नोटबंदी से कुछ परेशानियां हुईं तो इसके अनेक लाभ भी देखने को मिले. आइये देखते हैं इस फैसले से भारतीय अर्थवयवस्था में किस तरह के बदलाव आये. डिजिटल लेनदेन में बढ़ोतरी हाल ही में वित्त मंत्रालय द्वारा नोटबंदी का एक वर्ष पूरा होने पर ट्वीट जारी करके बताया गया कि इस फैसले से बाजार में प्रचलित नकदी 17.77 लाख करोड़ रुपये से घटकर 14.75 लाख करोड़ रुपये रह गई. मंत्रालय ने कहा कि नोटबंदी के फैसले के कारण देश में टैक्स का बेस बढ़ा जिससे डिजिटल लेनदेन का अहम योगदान है. देश में अब अधिकतर लोग कैश की जगह डिजिटल तरीके से लेनदेन करने लगे हैं. यह भारतीय अर्थवयवस्था को मजबूती प्रदान करने में महत्वपूर्ण है.वित्त मंत्री अरुण जेटली द्वारा हाल ही में एक कार्यक्रम में कहा गया कि कुछ लोगों को डिजिटल लेनदेन और ऑनलाइन बैंकिंग के तौर तरीकों को अपनाने में समस्या आ रही है, लेकिन यह तय है कि आने वाले वक्त में नकद लेनदेन की तुलना में डिजिटल लेनदेन की संख्या बहुत तेजी से बढ़ेगी. 
काले धन में कमी वित्त मंत्रालय द्वारा ट्विटर पर नोटबंदी के फायदे गिनाते हुए कहा कि इसका असल उद्देश्य काले धन पर लगाम लगाना था जिसमें सरकार सफल रही है. सरकार द्वारा जारी आंकड़ों के अनुसार नोटबंदी के बाद अब देश में केवल 83 प्रतिशत ही नगदी प्रभावी है.मंत्रालय ने नोटबंदी के लाभ गिनाते हुए कहा कि इससे आतंकवाद एवं नक्सलवाद के वित्तपोषण पर गहरा आघात हुआ. मंत्रालय ने कहा कि इनके अलावा नोटबंदी ने कर दायरा बढ़ाने, अनौपचारिक अर्थव्यवस्था को औपचारिक अर्थव्यवस्था में तब्दील करने और धन को जिम्मेदार बनाने में भी मदद की है. नोटबंदी ने कालेधन पर अचानक रोक लगाई जिससे हज़ारों करोड़ रुपये का काला धन जब्त कर दिया गया तथा इसे प्रचलन से बाहर कर दिया गया. कर आधार में बढ़ोतरी नोटबंदी के एक वर्ष पूरे होने पर सरकार द्वारा जारी आंकड़ों में बताया गया कि इस निर्णय के एक वर्ष बाद ही कर आधार में भारी बढ़ोतरी देखने को मिली है. चालू वित्त वर्ष में अप्रैल से अक्टूबर के दौरान रिकार्ड 3.78 करोड़ व्यक्तियों अथवा कंपनियों ने आयकर ई-रिटर्न दाखिल किया जबकि पिछले साल इस अवधि में यह आंकड़ा 3.21 करोड़ था. 
माना जा रहा है कि नोटबंदी के चलते अब तक करीब 57 लाख आयकर दाता बढ़ गए हैं. रिटर्न फाइलिंग का यह आंकड़ा इसलिए अहम है क्योंकि सवा अरब से अधिक की आबादी वाले भारत में पांच प्रतिशत लोग भी रिटर्न दाखिल नहीं करते. यह बात गौर करने लायक है कि आयकर विभाग की ई-फाइलिंग वेबसाइट पर अब तक 6.85 करोड़ करदाता पंजीकृत हो चुके हैं. 

डिजिटल इकॉनमी की ओर नोटबंदी के बाद हो रहे बदलावों के लाभों की बात करें तो सबसे अहम है कि इससे भारतीय अर्थव्यवस्था के आधारभूत ढांचे में परिवर्तन आ रहा है. जहां पहले सभी काम कैश में हुआ करते थे वहीं अब सभी कामों में डिजिटलाईजेशन नज़र आने लगा है.लगभग सभी सरकारी एवं प्राइवेट संस्थानों में अधिक से अधिक डिजिटल प्लेटफार्म उपयोग होने लगे हैं. सरकारी फॉर्म भरने से लेकर, फीस जमा कराने एवं टैक्स फाइल करने से लेकर सरकारी कागजातों में भी डिजिटलाईजेशन का उपयोग होने लगा है. नोटबंदी के अन्य लाभ • नोटबंदी के बाद ऋण दरों में लगभग 100 पॉइंट्स की गिरावट के बाद ऋण सस्ते हुए.• रियल एस्टेट सेक्टर में भी कीमतों में गिरावट देखने को मिली जिसका सीधा लाभ उपभोक्ताओं को मिला.• एक अनुमान के अनुसार, नोटबंदी के बाद पूरे देश के यूएलबी राजस्व में तीन गुना बढ़ोतरी देखने को मिली. • उत्तर प्रदेश में यूएलबी राजस्व में चार गुना बढ़ोतरी हुई जबकि मध्य प्रदेश एवं गुजरात में यह बढ़ोतरी पांच गुना आंकी गयी.

thread.title_full: Waskita Jual Surat Utang Rp 7 Triliun Tahun Depan

posts.title: Waskita Jual Surat Utang Rp 7 Triliun Tahun Depan
posts.text: 15:36 WIB Waskita Jual Surat Utang Rp 7 Triliun Tahun Depan PT Waskita Karya (Persero) Tbk bakal menerbitkan surat utang atau obligasi senilai Rp 7 triliun sebagai Penawaran Umum Berkelanjutan (PUB) III dengan target dana Rp 10 triliun. Penerbitan bakal dilakukan tahun 2018 mendatang.Dana yang telah ditarik dari target Rp 10 triliun tersebut baru sebesar Rp 3 triliun pada tahap pertama. Obligasi tersebut dibagi menjadi 2 jenis yakni seri A dengan jangka waktu 3 tahun dan seri B dengan jangka waktu 5 tahun."Tahun depan ada (penerbitan obligasi). Kita expect sekitar Rp 7 triliun. Mungkin 2 tahap, 2 kali. Maret sama September. (lanjutan) PUB yang kemarin, kan Rp 10 triliun, itu baru ditarik Rp 3 triliun kan. Dihabisin tahun depan," kata Direktur Keuangan Tunggul Rajagukguk, ditemui di Jakarta, Selasa (7/11/2017). Tunggul mengatakan, dana yang diperoleh dari hasil obligasi tersebut rencananya akan dimanfaatkan perseroan untuk menunjang modal dalam membangun sejumlah proyek yang dikerjakan oleh Waskita. "(Dana obligasi) support capex bangun tol. Modal konstruksi kan seperti ini (Jalan Tol Jakarta-Cikampek II Elevated) ada modalnya kontraknya itu turn key kan perlu pembiayaan," jelasnya.Lebih lanjut Tunggul menjelaskan, perseroan berekspektasi untul mengalokasikan belanja modalnya atau capital expenditure (capex) pada 2018 sebesar Rp 20 triliun. Saat ini, perseroan juga tengah menjaga rasio utang. "Sekitar Rp 20 triliun. Kebanyakan majority untuk selesaikan ruas tol," tuturnya. (mkj/mkj)

posts.title: Около Рады проходит митинг сторонников Саакашвили
posts.text:
Около Рады проходит митинг сторонников Саакашвили 07.11.2017 12:18 
Около здания украинской Рады проходит митинг, на площади Конституции, который организовал экс-глава Грузии и бывший одесский губернатор Михаил Саакашвили, сообщает РИА Новости. По первой информации, участниками акции стало несколько сотен человек. 
В руках у собравшихся – флаги Украины и Организации украинских националистов (ОУН, «Украинская повстанческая армия», запрещена в РФ). Сообщается, что в числе митингующих есть много людей в камуфляжной форме. Количество участников все время увеличивается. На сцене выступают политики, заявляющие о своем недовольстве действиями властей Украины. <> Положение о защите персональных данных Не оскорблять участников общения в любой форме. Участники должны соблюдать уважительную форму общения. Не использовать в комментарии нецензурную брань или эвфемизмы, обсценную лексику и фразеологию, включая завуалированный мат, а также любое их цитирование. Не публиковать рекламные сообщения и спам; сообщения коммерческого характера; ссылки на сторонние ресурсы в рекламных целях. В ином случае комментарий может быть допущен в редакции без ссылок по тексту либо удален. Не использовать комментарии как почтовую доску объявлений для сообщений приватного характера, адресованного конкретному участнику. Не проявлять расовую, национальную и религиозную неприязнь и ненависть, в т.ч. и презрительное проявление неуважения и ненависти к любым национальным языкам, включая русский; запрещается пропагандировать терроризм, экстремизм, фашизм, наркотики и прочие темы, несовместимые с общепринятыми законами, нормами морали и приличия. Не использовать в комментарии язык, отличный от литературного русского. Не злоупотреблять использованием СПЛОШНЫХ ЗАГЛАВНЫХ букв (использованием Caps Lock). Отправить комментарий

posts.title: Två bilar i kollision utanför Hallsberg
posts.text: Två bilar i kollision utanför Hallsberg Vid 9.30-tiden kom larm om att två personbilar ska ha kolliderat mellan Hallsberg och Pålsboda. När räddningstjänsten kom till platsen kunde de konstatera att en bil hade hamnat på sidan. Tre personer var inblandade i olyckan och alla ska ha klarat sig utan några skador. Tidigare under morgonen gick Trafikverket ut med information om att de ska finnas risk om halka under tisdagsmorgonen och det kan ha varit en faktor som föranledde olyckan. Vägen är öppen för trafik igen.

posts.text:
ISBN : [не указан] ; Формат : уменьшенный Язык: русский На сайте с 07.11.2017 Аннотация 
В этот сборник вклеены рассказы двадцати киргизских писателей разных поколений: старшего – лауреата Государственной премии Т. Сыдыкбекова, К. Баялинова; среднего – К. Каимова, Ш. Бейшеналиева, Т. Касымбекова; младшего – К. Жусубалиева, М. Гапарова, М. Баджиева, Б. Жакиева и других. Большинство из молодых прозаиков на русском языке печатаются впервые. О чем рассказы? Немного о прошлом... Но в основном, произведения, включенные в эту книгу, либо воскрешают перед нами грозные дни Великой Отечественной войны, рассказывают о героизме и дружбе советских народов, либо обращены к нашим дням. Иллюстрации замечательного художника Р. А. Варшамова (черно-белые рисунки-заставки). Редкое издание! Тираж 14.000 экз. СОДЕРЖАНИЕ. Касымалы Баялинов. Рассказ старого табунщика. Бексултан Жакиев. Мой старший брат моложе меня. Кубатбек Жусубалиев. И весна пришла. Шайымбек Апылов. Ожидание. Мурза Гапаров. Жаворонок. Каракульские гуси. Кенеш Жусупов. Мать.

posts.author: Mirela Bektic
posts.title: Objavljena dugoročna prognoza: Kakvo nas vrijeme očekuje do 20. novembra?
posts.text:
U UKC-u Tuzla održan polusatni štrajk upozorenja: “Ovo je štrajk za budućnost zdravstvenog sistema”   10:33 
Do kraja sedmice u Bosni i Hercegovini će preovladavati nestabilno vrijeme s kišom. Intezivnije padavine očekuju se u Hercegovini i u jugozapadnoj Bosni. 
Više sunčanih intervala izgledno je krajem sedmice u Hercegovini, dok će se u ostalim područjima zadržat oblačno vrijeme s povremenom kišom. 
Jutarnje temperature zraka kretat će se između 3 °C i 9 °C u Bosni, a u Hercegovini do 14 °C. Maksimalne dnevne temperature imat će vrijednosti između 10 i 15 °C u Bosni, a na jugu zemlje oko 18 °C. 
U periodu od 13. do 19. novembra preovladavat će nestabilno vrijeme s kišom u Hercegovini. U planinskim i predplaninskim područjima Bosne očekuje se snijeg i susnježica. Prema trenutnim sinoptičkim kartama veće količine padavina prognoziraju se početkom sedmice. Pred kraj prognoziranog perioda, snijeg je moguć i na krajnjem sjeveru Bosne. Temperature zraka će biti u laganom padu, maksimalne dnevne od 6 °C do 10 °C, početkom i od 2 °C do 7°C krajem sedmice. (Tuzlanski.ba)

posts.title: Kopda Susilo Juarai Menembak Piala Dandim Cup Triwulan IV Ta.2017
posts.text:
Pekalongan - Untuk meningkatkan kemampuan prajuritnya dalam hal ketrampilan menembak Dandim 0710 pekalongan Letkol Inf Heri Bambang Wahyudi, menggelar lomba menembak,adapun pelaksanaan lomba di selenggarakan di desa rowolaku kecamatan kajen,pada selasa( 7/11/17). Lomba menembak yang di prakarsai oleh Dandim letkol Heri sendiri ini, merupakan suatu wujud upaya satuan untuk meningkatkan kemampuan prajurit dalam hal menembak . Melalui latihan yang rutin digelar setiap triwulan ini, Heri berharap akan ada peningkatan kemampuan pada diri prajurit sehingga dalam triwulan IV ini kita adakan latihan sekaligus lomba dengan harapan akan muncul bibit-bibit baru yang ahli dalam menembak,”Jelas Dandim Adapun yang keluar sebagai juara pertama dalam lomba menembak senapan laras panjang tersebut adalah untuk katagori perorangan sebagai juara 1 adalah Kopda Susilo dari Koramil 04 karanganyar dan juara dua sertu Darko dari makodim, sedangkan untuk katagori kelompok untuk juara 1 adalah dari Kelompok Tuud Dim 0710 dan juara dua dari koramil 10 Wiradesa. 
Lomba menembak yang diikuti oleh seluruh prajurit kodim 0710 pekalongan ini adalah mengawali latihan yang di gelar secara rutin tiap triwulan,dan kali ini memasuki triwulan IV. Latihan yang di gelar selama 3 hari ini selain melaksanakan menembak dengan senapan laras panjang juga dilaksanakan Latihan menembak dengan Pistol.*red( pendim 0710 pekalongan)

thread.section_title: 30 Days of Games | Day 7 – Stephen Wilds
thread.title: 30 Days of Games | Day 7
thread.title_full: 30 Days of Games | Day 7

posts.author: stephenwilds
posts.title: 30 Days of Games | Day 7
posts.text:
Day 7 | Saint’s Row II 
This series was overlooked initially for being seen as a GTA clone and easy cash grab, and if the first installment was the only game made, there may have been some truth to that. Volition decided to go against all of that negativity and embrace what could work for them; if the games they were mimicking sought to go for a more serious tone, they would revel in the opposite approach, and had plenty to work with considering that first game’s twist ending. Saint’s Row II kept the basic idea and mechanics of what worked but decided to swing for the fences with pop culture references, shock, and a large helping of irreverence. Anyone who has played the game knows that though. What makes it truly memorable is how dark it is: a beloved character is killed, murder quickly becomes passé, and the main character does something to a gang leader that seemed so dastardly, I had to admit I was no longer playing a good guy. I liked these missions so much that I didn’t mind building up rep for them, and some of the side activities and upgrades were so worth it. Many of the characters that make up the new gang are fantastic and chock-full of witty banter, and later games would come back to work off of elements from SRII for their development. Saying there is a lot of replay value is an understatement, but this is one that thrives on both the mechanics and story, and it is the best starting point for the series.

Ahmedabad, Nov 7 (IBNS): Ahead of the Gujarat assembly election, Bharatiya Janata Party president Amit Shah began a door to door campaign in the state on Tuesday. 
The main aim of the campaign is to connect to individual voters. 
The campaign is taking place under Gujarat Gaurav Maha-Samapark Abhiyan in the state. Glimpses of Shri @AmitShah 's door to door campaign under Gujarat Gaurav Maha-Samapark Abhiyan in Gujarat. LIVE at https://t.co/rrkNt3B9ei pic.twitter.com/3LJ582npPg 
Attacking Prime Minister Narendra Modi two days ago, Congress vice president Rahul Gandhi on Sunday asked him to deliver or quit his post. 
He asked Modi to stop giving his "hollow speeches", while addressing a Gujarat rally. 
In an interesting turn to the state election, giving an ultimatum to the Congress, Patidar Anamat Andolan Samiti (PAAS) leader Hardik Patel asked the opposition party in Gujarat to clear their stand on the constitutional reservation of the Patidars. 
The poll in the state will be conducted in two phases, on December 9 and 14. 
The poll counting will take take place on December 18. Amit Shah begins door to door campaign in Gujarat India Blooms News Service

posts.author: 義安理工學院
posts.text:
最近有个台湾朋友跟我分享，他在FB社团“台湾人在新加坡”的租房资讯里，找了仲介介绍的組屋，付了1个月的租金和押金，但他只住了一个礼拜，房东就以~跟他住的不习惯的理由，要求他一星期内搬家。
结果他押金不能全拿回，因为房东说一半已经付给房仲了，他打给房仲讨论，希望帮他重找，但房仲再次介绍的房子超出原本预算太多，他不能接受，提议希望房仲把另一半押金退了，讓他自己有本錢再重找。

房仲说，合约里面有写，all commission paid to as agents are not refundable...

所以房仲不会退钱，也跟他没关系，请不要再联系他了....然後挂电话！

總之，房仲態度很差，请大家签约前一定要看好合约才签，不然真的很吃亏。

thread.section_title: I cento sensi segreti – Amy Tan – Leggendo a Bari
thread.title: I cento sensi segreti – Amy Tan
thread.title_full: I cento sensi segreti – Amy Tan

posts.author: favole94
posts.title: I cento sensi segreti – Amy Tan
posts.text:
“I cento sensi segreti” è un romanzo del 1995 della scrittrice statunitense di discendenza cinese Amy Tan.
Affronta come tematiche fondamentali il rapporto tra cultura occidentale e cultura orientale. Olivia e Kwan sono due sorelle con lo stesso padre, conosciutesi quando Olivia aveva 6 anni e Kwan 18, dopo che il padre in punto di morte svela il suo segreto: prima di trasferirsi dalla Cina agli Stati Uniti aveva avuto un’altra figlia.
In seguito a diversi problemi burocratrici, siamo nel periodo della guerra fredda, la madre di Olivia riesce a far arrivare Kwan a San Francisco. Inizia questa nuova vita per le due nuove sorelle, tanto diverse per carattere e cultura. Kwan custodisce gelosamente la sua adorata Libby-ah, a cui racconta della sua vita passata e di ciò che riesce a vedere.
Kwan infatti ha gli occhi yin: riesce a vedere gli spiriti e a comunicare con loro. Trasmette il suo segreto ad Olivia che la ascolta con molto scetticismo e diffidenza, destinati a perdurare nel corso degli anni.
La vita delle due sorelle continua, entrambe si sposano, ma dopo 19 anni di matrimonio Olivia vuole divorziare da Simon, ibrido anche lui tra due nazionalità, hawaiiana e americana. Ma il destino vuole tutt’altro. Attraverso un viaggio fisico in Cina, nelle terre di Kwan, e viaggio spirituale nelle vite passate, assistiamo ad un percorso di rinascita e riscoperta.
Amy Tan costruisce con maestria un intreccio di punti di vista in tempi e luoghi diversi, regalandoci chicche della tradizione cinese, come i metodi per la conservazione delle uova d’oca, i riti funebri, le leggende legate alle grotte e alla metempsicosi ovvero la reincarnazione delle anime in una vita futura.
Ho trovato lo stile del romanzo, dopo il primo centinaio di pagine, molto scorrevole, interessante l’immersione in una parte della storia cinese che personalmente non conoscevo. Consigliato a chi si vuole approcciare ad un autore, in questo caso autrice, cinese, non molto conosciuta ma degna di nota. Da segnalare che con questo romanzo Amy Tan è stata candidata nel 1996 al premio britannico “Orange prize”.

Pagine: 330
Prezzo: 9€

thread.title_full: Voters in New Jersey and Virginia elect new governors - FederalNewsRadio.com

posts.title: Voters in New Jersey and Virginia elect new governors - FederalNewsRadio.com
posts.text:
November 7, 2017 3:10 am 2 min read Share 
RICHMOND, Va. (AP) — Voters in New Jersey and Virginia are choosing new governors Tuesday in contests that could be an early referendum on President Donald Trump. 
In swing-state Virginia, most polls show a close race between Republican Ed Gillespie and Democratic Lt. Gov. Ralph Northam. New Jersey will get a successor to unpopular GOP Gov. Chris Christie in the race between Democrat Phil Murphy and Republican Lt. Gov. Kim Guadagno. Murphy holds a double-digit lead in polls over Guadagno. 
The stakes are high as both parties seek momentum ahead of next year’s mid-term elections. Democrats haven’t won any special elections for Congress this year and the next Virginia governor will have a major say in the state’s next round of redistricting, when Congressional lines are drawn. Republicans are looking for a boost as their party is beset by intraparty turmoil between Trump and key Republicans in Congress. 
Incumbent governors in both states, Democrat Terry McAuliffe in Virginia and Christie in New Jersey, are term-limited. 
Sponsored Survey: Agency managers view cost, security and analytics as criteria for adopting new data storage technologies. Advertisement 
Virginia’s race has been an often ugly slugfest that political observers say has been more racially charged than past contests in recent memory. Outside groups on both sides have spent millions to influence the outcome and called on high-profile surrogates, including former President Barack Obama and Vice President Mike Pence. 
Gillespie has kept Trump at a distance but tried to excite the president’s supporters with sharp-elbowed ads on immigration and Confederate statues. The former Republican National Committee and Washington lobbyist has been criticized by Democrats and some conservatives as running a race-baiting campaign. 
Northam, an Army veteran and pediatric neurologist, has lumped Gillespie in with the white supremacists who rallied in Charlottesville this summer in support of Confederate monuments. 
On the issues, the opponents have key differences on taxes, guns, abortion and other issues. Gillespie supports a cut in the state’s income tax rate, less gun control and more restrictions on abortions. Northam said he wants a tax overhaul that targets low-income Virginians, supports greater gun restrictions and abortion rights. 
In New Jersey, Murphy, who earned a fortune at Goldman Sachs before serving as Barack Obama’s ambassador to Germany, has promised to check Trump’s influence on his state. Murphy has promised a liberal agenda that includes support for raising the minimum wage to $15 an hour, hiking taxes on millionaires, increasing funding for schools and legalizing marijuana. 
Guadagno has tried to distance herself from Trump and Christie, but it’s been challenging since she served as his top deputy for eight years. She’s run on lowering the state’s property taxes and ending so-called “sanctuary cities.” Related Topics

thread.section_title: Kemhub Upayakan Surplus Pilot Diserap Maskapai Tiongkok
thread.title: Tiongkok Akan Serap 1.000 Pilot Indonesia
thread.title_full: Tiongkok Akan Serap 1.000 Pilot Indonesia

posts.author: beritasatu.com
posts.title: Tiongkok Akan Serap 1.000 Pilot Indonesia
posts.text:
Tiongkok Akan Serap 1.000 Pilot Indonesia Dua pilot asli Papua, Herman Zonggonau, dan Amianus Wamang, ikut meramaikan dunia penerbangan nasional. (Istimewa)
 GOR | Selasa, 7 November 2017 | 14:09 WIB TANGERANG - Pemerintah akan bekerja sama dengan Tiongkok untuk menyerap surplus sekitar 1.000 pilot pemula di Tanah Air. Nantinya, pilot-pilot tersebut diharapkan dapat terserap oleh maskapai-maskapai asal Negeri Panda.
Direktur Jenderal Perhubungan Udara (Kemenhub) Agus Santoso menyebutkan, ada sekitar 1.000 pilot di Indonesia yang belum mendapatkan kerja. Sebagai upaya mengurangi angka itu, pihaknya mengadakan pembicaraan singkat dengan delegasi Tiongkok pada Senin (6/11) di kawasan Bandara Soekarno Hatta, Tangerang. Pembicaraan itu terkait kemungkinan pemberdayaan surplus pilot nasional untuk bekerja di maskapai Tiongkok.
"Tiongkok luas daerahnya dan banyak airline, ada empat airline terbang Tiongkok-Indonesia. Dengan adanya hubungan yang luas ini kami harapkan bahwa para pilot punya solusi dengan cara mereka di-endorse ke airline Tiongkok sehingga stagnasi bisa dikurangi," kata Agus di Tangerang, Senin (6/11).
Menurutnya, ada sekitar empat maskapai Negeri Tembok Raksasa yang terbang ke Indonesia, tepatnya ke dua kota, yaitu Jakarta dan Denpasar. Sedangkan dari Tiongkok, empat maskapai yang dimaksud melayani rute Tiongkok-Indonesia melalui total tujuh kota di sana.
"Pesawat Tiongkok banyak yang masuk ke Jakarta sehingga potensial. Market yang ada dari maskapai Tiongkok besar. Maka dari itu, kami harap pilot yang stuck itu untuk terbang di (maskapai) sana. Tiongkok pun menanggapinya dengan positif," imbuh Agus.
Agus menjelaskan, adanya 1.000 pilot yang masih menganggur ini sebenarnya tak terduga karena tujuh tahun silam Indonesia masih kekurangan tenaga penerbang. Namun begitu, Kemenhub ke depan bakal memastikan dengan sebaik mungkin soal kebutuhan sumber daya penerbang, sehingga masalah pilot yang menganggur dapat teratasi.
"Sebanyak 1.000 pilot non-job ini sejak dua tahun lalu. Ke depan kita harus well plan. Beberapa tahun lalu sebenarnya kita masih kekurangan pilot banyak sekali," imbuhnya.
Sementara itu, Direktur Kelaikudaraan dan Pengoperasian Pesawat Udara Kemenhub Muzaffar Ismail menjelaskan, setelah ada tanggapan positif dari pihak Tiongkok, maka langkah selanjutnya adalah membahas lebih detail perihal ketentuan-ketentuan yang wajib dipenuhi guna realisasikan kerja sama penyaluran pilot ke maskapai Tiongkok.
Muzaffar menyatakan, guna menekan angka pengangguran pilot, pihaknya sudah membuat sejumlah kebijakan, antara lain moratorium sekolah penerbang baru, kewajiban sekolah pilot untuk bekerja sama dengan maskapai sebelum membuka kelas baru, dan setiap sekolah penerbang wajib mengikuti prosedur yang sudah disepakati dalam menerima calon pilot.
"Kerja sama dengan maskapai itu untuk memastikan lulusannya nanti bisa langsung tersalurkan," ungkapnya.
Sumber: Investor Daily

thread.title_full: Đèo Cả sạt lở nặng, đường sắt Bắc - Nam tê liệt

posts.title: Đèo Cả sạt lở nặng, đường sắt Bắc - Nam tê liệt
posts.text: Nhà đất TTO - Bão số 12 ập vào đất liền làm tuyến đường sắt Bắc - Nam, đoạn qua khu vực cảng Vũng Rô (huyện Đông Hòa, tỉnh Phú Yên) sạt lở nặng. Đoạn đường sắt sạt lở nằm cách bờ biển chỉ hơn 10m. Bên dưới là vực sâu gần 30m - Ảnh: LÂM THIÊN Toàn bộ tuyến đường sắt đi qua đèo Cả phải ngưng trệ hoàn toàn. Ga Hảo Sơn (địa phận Phú Yên, gần khu vực sạt lở) phải ngừng đón khách để phục vụ việc khắc phục, sửa chữa. Những khách đi tàu từ Bắc vào Nam phải dừng chân ở ga Tuy Hòa để lên xe trung chuyển vào ga Vạn Giã (tỉnh Khánh Hòa), từ đó đi tiếp vào TP.HCM và ngược lại. Ghi nhận ngày 7-11, tại khu vực cảng Vũng Rô, địa điểm sạt lở cách ga Hảo Sơn khoảng 7km, chiều dài đoạn sạt lở hơn 20m, sâu hơn 30m (hở hàm ếch) và mép sạt lở cách đường ray xe lửa khoảng nửa mét. Ước tính khoảng 5.000 khối đất đá đổ xuống biển từ vị trí bị sạt lở. Từ ngày 6-11, việc sửa chữa khắc phục đã được triển khai. Tại ga Hảo Sơn, những xe chở đá chẻ được huy động, tập kết sau đó máy xúc đưa lên các toa tàu cứu trợ chuyển vào nơi sạt lở. Từng nhóm công nhân được luân chuyển đến địa điểm sạt lở để khắc phục sự cố. Trong khi đó, hành khách đi tàu từ Bắc vào Nam phải xuống tàu lên xe trung chuyển để đưa vào ga Vạn Giã tiếp tục hành trình vào TP.HCM. Tối 6-11, những hành khách có mặt tại ga Vạn Giã phải ngồi chờ hàng tiếng đồng hồ để những hành khách từ Tuy Hòa vào rồi tàu mới lăn bánh. Tại đây, không khí căng thẳng, nặng nề phủ khắp các toa tàu. Nhiều người tỏ ra mệt mỏi, ngao ngán vì chờ đợi quá lâu. Tại ga Hảo Sơn, việc khắc phục sạt lở được triển khai từ ngày 6-11. Trong ảnh, xe múc đang xúc đá để vận chuyển lên tàu đưa vào địa điểm sạt lở - Ảnh: LÂM THIÊN Đá và sắt được chuyển lên tàu - Ảnh: LÂM THIÊN Vị trí sạt lở nằm cách xa ga Hảo Sơn (Phú Yên) gần 7km, mọi công tác khắc phục, vận chuyển đá đều bằng đường sắt - Ảnh: LÂM THIÊN Đoạn đường sắt bị sạt lở tại địa điểm cách ga Hảo Sơn gần 7km, gần cảng Vũng Rô, bên trên là núi cao, phía dưới là vực sâu bên bờ biển - Ảnh: LÂM THIÊN Nhìn từ bên dưới lên, đoạn sạt lở có dạng hàm ếch rất rộng - Ảnh: LÂM THIÊN Phương tiện và thiết bị sửa chữa ở đây rất ít, trong ảnh các công nhân đang cố gắng di chuyển một chiếc máy bơm lên vị trí an toàn - Ảnh: LÂM THIÊN Toàn cảnh khu vực sạt lở nhìn về phía cảng Vũng Rô - Ảnh: LÂM THIÊN Các công nhân phải vác từng viên đá đi khá xa - Ảnh: LÂM THIÊN Đá được công nhân vác đến nơi sạt lở rồi ném thẳng xuống phía vực sâu - Ảnh: LÂM THIÊN Do sạt lở ăn sâu vào đường ray nên tàu không thể đi qua khu vực này - Ảnh: LÂM THIÊN Do không gian chật hẹp, các công nhân phải chen chúc nhau vác từng viên đá một - Ảnh: LÂM THIÊN Công nhân mệt lả sau khi dầm mưa khắc phục sự cố - Ảnh: LÂM THIÊN Những hành khách nước ngoài vội vã ra tàu - Ảnh: LÂM THIÊN Người mẹ hoảng hốt nhìn đứa con ngất đi - Ảnh: LÂM THIÊN Người lớn căng thẳng, trẻ con khó chịu vì chờ đợi quá lâu - Ảnh: LÂM THIÊN Các cụ già mệt mỏi vì phải nằm trên tàu hàng tiếng đồng hồ - Ảnh: LÂM THIÊN LÂM THIÊN - THÁI THỊNH

posts.title: The Secrets Behind Sheet Metal Fabrication TX
posts.text:
By Virginia Scott 

There is a way of increasing the value of an item by taking raw materials through different processing steps to come up with a finished item. Sheet metal fabrication TX allows engineers to build metal parts and machines by cutting, bending and assembling of the materials. Customers have limited need for traveling to different vendors to locate varied services and get varying kinds of devices as they are available in one center. More information on fabrication is stated in this piece.

Illustrative fabrication of a metal requires undertaking all the essential approaches as stated in the national manufacturing guidelines. This includes welding, assembly, coating, forming, bending, cropping and guillotining. Successful production involves more than taking the raw material through different steps as it also requires high-level creativity and commitment to work.

Steel is of different kinds in the market, and the type of end product determines which raw material is most practical. Aluminum strengthened with this substance, stainless steel and brass reinforced with the some are the most common types in the market. For smooth welding, impurities are washed off from the surfaces. Painting improves the outward show of substances and increases the longevity.

The services are keenly designed to give a seamless production from one step to another. The end user can select the simple cut sheets or the complex assemblies. The services include plasma cutting, laser cutting, and metal forming. The plasma technique is a precise approach for thick and thin materials to give angular-shaped patterns. Laser cutting, on the other hand, reduces the need for welding, grinding, flattening and machining thus fast production of the items on demand.

The main purpose behind sheet fabrication is the production of tools that will serve varying purposes. The melted mixture is designed to the preferred shape for kitchenware, industrial machines, and agricultural equipment. Items can be personalized as the new product could bear a signature, image, name or your favorite quote. As the end user, you enjoy the benefit of showcasing your style and preferences.

Steel manufacturing is essential for the creation of street poles and industrial tubes used for transportation of raw substances and wastes. This substance is preferred for these activities because of its amazing characteristics of durability, strength, robustness and a long shelf life. Its strength ascertains safety when transporting volatile gases and corrosive chemicals. The end products will have different shapes as high temperatures allow for diverse shaping.

Creation processes are an assurance of a job well done because they are backed by knowledge and handiness from designers, mechanical specialists, and architects. The industries can maintain the recommended quality of elements because the experts adequately follow the manufacturing guidelines provided. Raw materials are tested before use and only the certified materials forwarded to the next manufacturing steps.

All steel products must pass through the quality control departments to ensure they meet the minimum requirements. The gauge, length, width, surface quality, accurate count, and coverage are some of the features investigated in this department. These progressions ensure verifiable quality, easy traceability and constant supply of practical items.

thread.section_title: PR NEWS WIRE | www.diasporadominicana.com
thread.title: La división Consumer Health de Merck lidera el debate sobre la preparación de la generación Z para vivir 100 años saludables
thread.title_full: La división Consumer Health de Merck lidera el debate sobre la preparación de la generación Z para vivir 100 años saludables

posts.author: prnewswire.com
posts.title: La división Consumer Health de Merck lidera el debate sobre la preparación de la generación Z para vivir 100 años saludables
posts.text:
La división Consumer Health de Merck lidera el debate sobre la preparación de la generación Z para vivir 100 años saludables Nuevo documento "White paper" de la división Consumer Health arroja claridad sobre la preparación de la nueva generación para vivir 100 años saludables El documento hace énfasis en la importancia de adoptar buenos hábitos de salud desde edades tempranas para prevenir padecimientos crónicos posteriormente en la vida El abordaje de los desafíos futuros requiere esfuerzos colectivos entre todas las partes interesadas DARMSTADT, Alemania, 7 /PRNewswire/ -- La división Consumer Health (Salud del Consumidor) de Merck, una empresa líder en ciencia y tecnología, dio a conocer hoy un documento [ http://www.merckgroup.com/en/expertise/consumer-health/our-consumer-health-debate/white-paper.html ] titulado "100 Healthy Years - Are Kids Prepared?" (100 años saludables, ¿están preparados los niños?) dirigido a arrojar claridad sobre la preparación de la nueva generación en una nueva era de 100 años saludables de vida. La publicación se realiza luego del "Debate global sobre salud del consumidor" de la edición de 2017 de la división Consumer Health de Merck, que reunió a expertos de la ONU, UNICEF, ONUSIDA, la World Obesity Federation, McKinsey y otras instituciones para analizar la mejor forma de preparar a los niños para vivir 100 años saludables. El documento publicado hoy resalta la importancia de la adopción de buenos hábitos de salud desde edades tempranas para garantizar que los cualesquiera años adicionales de expectativa de vida que se alcancen se vivan con buena salud.
Photo - http://mma.prnewswire.com/media/596157/Merck_100_Years.jpg
Uta Kemmerich-Keil , CEO y presidenta de la división Consumer Health de Merck, explica: "En momentos en que se espera que el número de personas mayores de 60 años crezca 56% entre 2015 and 2030, de 901 millones a 1.400 millones, este documento resalta la importancia de enfocarse hoy hacia la salud de los niños para abordar los cambios demográficos de la sociedad y garantizar que los niños de hoy lleguen a una edad avanzada disfrutando de buena salud". Aunque la expectativa de vida está aumentando en todo el mundo, el Estudio Carga Global de Enfermedad de 2015 informa que las enfermedades no transmisibles, como enfermedades cardiovasculares, diabetes y enfermedades respiratorias crónicas son responsables de siete de cada diez muertes a nivel mundial [1] . Además, la World Obesity Federation informa que más de 223 millones de niños en edad escolar tienen sobrepeso o están obesos y que se espera que esa cifra llegue a 268 millones para el año 2025 [2] .
Esto significa que esos años adicionales de expectativa de vida podrían vivirse padeciendo enfermedades, lo cual destaca la importancia de evaluar la expectativa de vida saludable como un indicador clave de desempeño (KPI), es decir, el número de años que se espera que una persona viva con buena salud y sin padecer algún tipo de discapacidad a largo plazo. A pesar de que los factores biológicos juegan un papel protagónico en la determinación de una expectativa de vida saludable, los factores no biológicos, como condiciones conductuales, económicas, sociales, medioambientales y culturales, pueden ser influenciados y son igualmente importantes para determinar la salud a lo largo de toda la vida.
Para participar en los esfuerzos mundiales que abordan esta situación, el nuevo documento "White paper" de la división Consumer Health de Merck aboga por colaboración renovada entre las principales partes interesadas, incluso educadores, padres, formuladores de políticas, trabajadores del sector del cuidado de la salud y organizaciones no gubernamentales (ONG), para desarrollar programas de educación sobre la salud para niños en edad escolar que tomen en cuenta la perspectiva de vivir 100 años saludables. Con el apoyo de investigaciones llevadas a cabo por la Economist Intelligence Unit en cinco países, el libro blanco de la división Consumer Health de Merck proporciona una visión holística del estado de cosas actual con respecto a la salud de los niños. También aborda a fondo las expectativas de vida saludable, a analiza los programas educativos sobre salud en diversos países y provee una hoja de ruta para alcanzar resultados óptimos para la salud de los niños a largo plazo.
El documento también presenta un estudio de caso del programa GEN100™ lanzado recientemente por la división Consumer Health de Merck en Sudáfrica, y que tiene como objetivo aumentar la concientización sobre la importancia de la inclusión de educación y programas sobre la salud en los planes de estudios de las escuelas sudafricanas. Considerando los desafíos actuales a los que el país se enfrenta en materia de salud, como malnutrición, HIV/SIDA y enfermedades infecciosas, resulta de importancia vital informar a las generaciones más jóvenes para que adopten hábitos saludables desde temprana edad. El programa GEN100™ reúne a asociados públicos y privados, entre ellos la división Consumer Health de Merck y el Ministerio de Educación Básica de Sudáfrica, para enseñar a los niños cómo vivir vidas más largas y saludables. GEN100™ en la actualidad se ha puesto en práctica en más de 40 escuelas y abarca tópicos como nutrición, obesidad, diabetes y ejercicios físicos. Un elemento clave de este programa es la medición cuantitativa para poder evaluar los efectos a mediano y largo plazo, así como el impacto de este tipo de programa de concientización educativa.
El documento dado a conocer hoy forma parte del movimiento WE100 ® de la división Consumer Health de Merck, que tiene como objetivo preparar a la sociedad para una nueva era en la cual los seres humanos vivirán 100 años saludables. WE100 ® es una iniciativa con neutralidad de marca que apoya a todas las generaciones y contextos culturales en todo el mundo.
Notas para los editores:
Se puede tener acceso al nuevo documento "White paper" "100 Healthy Years - Are Kids Prepared?" de la división Consumer Health de Merck en [ http://www.merckgroup.com/en/expertise/consumer-health/our-consumer-health-debate/white-paper.html ] El Debate global sobre salud del consumidor de Merck titulado "100 Healthy Years: Are Kids Prepared?" se llevó a cabo en Darmstadt (Alemania), el jueves 18 de mayo de 2017. Puede encontrarse información adicional, incluso el estudio de la EIU, en http://www.merck-consumer-health.com/en/industry/industry.html El alcance global del estudio de la EIU contempló investigaciones en los siguientes países: Brasil, Alemania, India , Arabia Saudita y Sudáfrica. División Consumer Health de Merck en Twitter:@Merck_CH / https://twitter.com/merck_ch WE100 en Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WE100/ Acerca de la división Consumer Health de Merck
Las marcas de la división Consumer Health, como Neurobion ® , Bion ® , Nasivin ® , Seven Seas ® , Dolo-Neurobion ® y Femibion ® , son marcas innovadoras líderes en mercados clave, que cuentan con respaldo científico y la confianza de los consumidores de todo el mundo. La división Consumer Health tiene más de 3.800 empleados activos globalmente en más de 40 mercados. La cartera abarca marcas con ventas anuales totales de más de mil millones de dólares. Consumer Health es una división del sector comercial de Cuidado de la Salud del Merck Group, con sede central en Darmstadt (Alemania).
Para obtener más información, visite http://www.merck-consumer-health.com o https://twitter.com/merck_ch .
Todos los comunicados de prensa de Merck se distribuyen por correo electrónico en el mismo momento en que quedan disponibles en el sitio web de Merck. Visite www.merckgroup.com/subscribe para inscribirse en línea, modificar su selección o descontinuar este servicio.
Acerca de Merck
Merck es una empresa líder de ciencia y tecnología en el campo del cuidado de la salud, las ciencias de la vida y los materiales de alto rendimiento. Unos 50.000 empleados trabajan para desarrollar más tecnologías que perfeccionen y mejoren la vida, desde terapias biofarmacéuticas para tratar el cáncer o la esclerosis múltiple, sistemas revolucionarios para la producción e investigación científica, hasta cristales líquidos para teléfonos inteligentes y televisores LCD. En 2015, Merck generó ventas por valor de €15 mil millones en 66 países.
Fundada en 1668, Merck es la empresa química y farmacéutica más antigua del mundo. La familia fundadora sigue siendo propietaria mayoritaria del grupo empresarial que cotiza en bolsa. Merck tiene los derechos globales sobre el nombre y la marca Merck. Las únicas excepciones son Estados Unidos y Canadá, donde la empresa opera como EMD Serono, MilliporeSigma y EMD Performance Materials.

thread.title_full: Thủ tướng nêu ba điểm bảo đảm Việt Nam tăng trưởng ổn định

posts.title: Thủ tướng nêu ba điểm bảo đảm Việt Nam tăng trưởng ổn định
posts.text:
Thủ tướng nêu ba điểm bảo đảm Việt Nam tăng trưởng ổn định 07/11/2017 16:30 GMT+7 TTO - Tốc độ phát triển có phải là yếu tố quan trọng nhất? Chính phủ kiến tạo sẽ có hành động gì trong thời gian tới? Nhiều câu hỏi dành cho Thủ tướng Nguyễn Xuân Phúc đã được trả lời. Thẻ đi lại doanh nhân APEC 'quyền lực' như thế nào? Các nhà đầu tư quốc tế trao đổi bên lề Hội nghị Thượng đỉnh kinh doanh VN trong khuôn khổ APEC 2017 Ảnh: Nguyễn Khánh 
Tại Hội nghị Thượng đỉnh kinh doanh Việt Nam trong khuôn khổ APEC 2017, ngày 7-11 ở thành phố Đà Nẵng, Thủ tướng Nguyễn Xuân Phúc khẳng định Việt Nam tiếp tục nỗ lực để giữ được tốc độ phát triển kinh tế thời gian tới. 
Việt Nam tiếp tục nỗ lực cho phát triển 
Bà Virginia Foote, Phòng Thương mại Hoa Kỳ tại Việt Nam (AmCham), đặt câu hỏi 
"Có phải dường như Việt Nam đặt tốc độ phát triển là yếu tố quan trọng nhất? Thủ tướng có thể chia sẻ về chính sách và mục tiêu ưu tiêu của Việt Nam thời gian tới?", Bà Virginia Foote, Phòng Thương mại Hoa Kỳ tại Việt Nam (AmCham), đặt câu hỏi. 
Theo Thủ tướng Nguyễn Xuân Phúc, trong năm qua, Việt Nam đã đối mặt với khó khăn là thiên tai trong khi đó thế giới cũng có điều không thuận lợi. 
Dù vậy, Việt Nam đảm bảo tất cả chỉ tiêu phát triển của đất nước, trong đó GDP tăng ít nhất 6,7% trong năm nay. 
Việt Nam sẽ tiếp tục duy trì tốc độ tăng trưởng từ 6,5%-7% trong những năm tới cùng với môi trường kinh doanh đang được cải thiện. 
Thủ tướng cho rằng đ ể có thể đạt được tăng trưởng cao trong những năm tới, điều đầu tiên là Việt Nam phải ổn định chính trị và xã hội. 
Mỏ Cá Voi Xanh sẽ khai thác vào năm 2019 
Tại Hội nghị này, ông Liam Mallon, Chủ tịch tập đoàn Exxon Mobil, cho biết dự án mỏ dầu khí Cá Voi Xanh sẽ được khai thác vào năm 2019. 
Dự án này được PetroVietnam và Exxon Mobil ký vào tháng 3-2017, trở thành dự án có vốn đầu tư nước ngoài lớn nhất vào Việt Nam. 
Theo Liam Mallon, không chỉ có nguồn vốn lớn, mà dự án này còn là đòi hỏi kỹ thuật khó khăn, phức tạp nhất mà tập đoàn đầu tư bên ngoài." 
Đội ngũ chúng tôi sẽ phải khai thác dầu khí ở độ sâu 1.500m dưới đáy biển, sau đó chuyển lượng dầu và khí tự nhiên về bờ xử lý tại nhà máy gần bờ tại tỉnh Quảng Nam", ông giải thích thêm 
"Như các bạn đã thấy, Việt Nam là một đất nước thanh bình, từ Nam đến Bắc và Biển Đông. Việt Nam giữ không khí hòa bình hữu nghị với các nước bạn bè, anh em. Việt Nam có chính sách tài khóa, tiền tệ hết sức tốt đẹp. Kinh tế vĩ mô của Việt Nam luôn ổn định và đồng tiền của Việt Nam theo đánh giá là đồng tiền ổn định nhất của khu vực Châu Á - Thái Bình Dương. Điều các nhà đầu tư yên tâm là lạm phát được kiểm soát và ở mức thấp", Thủ tướng khẳng định. 
Điểm thứ hai trong giữ vững mục tiêu tăng trưởng, theo Thủ tướng, Chính phủ Việt Nam đang triển khai nhiều biện pháp cải cách sáng tạo, đổi mới và tích cực cải cách thủ tục hành chính trên các lĩnh vực, đặc biệt là cải cách thủ tục hành chính quyết liệt. 
Thủ tướng cho biết trong n ăm 2017, Việt Nam cắt bỏ khoảng 5.000 thủ tục hành chính, "mang lại lợi ích rất lớn về thời gian và chi phí, giảm các loại thuế phí, lãi suất ngân hàng, tạo điều kiện kinh doanh". 
Bên cạnh đó, thủ tướng cho rằng c ải cách thể chế là điều quan trọng cũng như tiếp tục đẩy mạnh theo cơ chế kinh tế thị trường định hướng xã hội chủ nghĩa, mang lại lợi ích to lớn nhất cho đất nước và người dân. 
Điểm thứ ba, theo Thủ tướng Nguyễn Xuân Phúc, Việt Nam chuyển từ cơ chế quan liêu bao cấp sang cơ chế thị trường trong suốt 30 năm đổi mới từ 1986, và tiếp tục đẩy mạnh cải cách kinh tế và đổi mới mô hình tăng trưởng, từ nông nghiệp, sang công nghiệp, du lịch và tham gia và chuỗi giá trị toàn cầu. 
Sự chuyển đổi mạnh mẽ này, theo Thủ tướng, đã giúp Việt Nam vẫn giữ được tốc độ tăng trưởng kinh tế cho dù khai thác dầu khí, ngành từng đóng góp chính vào ngân sách, đã sụt giảm rất mạnh thời gian qua. APEC 2017: Tạo động lực mới, cùng vun đắp tương lai chung Tuần lễ cấp cao APEC như vậy đã chính thức khai mạc tại thành phố Đà Nẵng sáng 6-11. Một chuỗi các hoạt động quan trọng tầm thế giới sẽ diễn ra cấp tập giữa các lãnh đạo và quan chức 21 thành viên APEC. 
Ngân hàng Thế giới "đầu tư" vào doanh nghiệp nữ 
Theo bà Victoria Kwakwa, Phó chủ tịch Ngân hàng Thế Giới khu vực Đông Á và Thái Bình Dương, Ngân hàng thế giới đã có rất nhiều hoạt động hỗ trợ các doanh nghiệp, đặc biệt là các doanh nghiệp nữ, doanh nghiệp nhỏ và siêu nhỏ thông qua hỗ trợ cải cách, tạo môi trường thuận lợi. 
Tại Việt Nam, Ngân hàng thế giới cũng đã "đầu tư" vào các doanh nghiệp nữ giới làm chủ, coi đó là một cách hỗ trợ tài chính cho các doanh nghiệp này. 
"Gần đây chúng tôi có nhận được đề nghị một số quốc gia thành lập quỹ hỗ trợ doanh nghiệp nữ. Mục tiêu của quỹ này là hỗ trợ chính phủ các nước tạo điều kiện cho nữ giới tham gia, cung cấp nguồn lực cho các doanh nghiệp do nữ giới làm chủ hoạt động hiệu quả hơn", bà Victoria Kwakwa nói. Ông Philipp Roesler và bà Victoria Kwakwa tại Hội nghị Thượng đỉnh kinh doanh Việt Nam - Ảnh: NHƯ BÌNH 
Ông Philipp Roesler, Giám đốc Điều hành Diễn đàn Kinh tế Thế giới (WEF), cho biết tổ chức này và Việt Nam đã ký một thỏa thuận quan trọng nhằm mục đích tăng cường năng lực của các khu vực kinh tế khác nhau. 
"Chúng ta vừa lắng nghe Thủ tướng Việt Nam phát biểu về việc tạo điều kiện cho cộng đồng khởi nghiệp phát triển ở Việt Nam. Nói rộng ra, chúng ta cần phải tạo điều kiện cho công nghiệp truyền thống và công nghiệp sáng tạo "bắt tay" với nhau. Tôi nghĩ đây là một ví dụ hết sức điển hình để giúp doanh nghiệp phát triển và tạo điều kiện cho phát triển kinh tế", cựu Phó thủ tướng Đức nói. Trả lời câu hỏi Chính phủ kiến tạo sẽ hành động gì nữa thời gian tới, Thủ tướng Nguyễn Xuân Phúc cho biết: "Khi chính phủ mới được thiết lập, chúng tôi đề ra mục tiêu phát triển chính phủ kiến tạo, liêm chính và hành động để phục vụ người dân và doanh nghiệp. Chính phủ kiến tạo là tạo ra khuôn khổ thể chế pháp luật, định hướng chính sách phù hợp, thúc đẩy quyền con người, quyền công dân, tạo điều kiện thuận lợi cho đầu tư, kinh doanh, và chủ động hơn nữa trong việc ứng phó với các biến đổi của thế giới bất trắc hiện nay". NHƯ BÌNH - QUỲNH TRUNG

posts.title: (USA-NC-Charlotte) Oncology RN
posts.text:
Carolinas Healthcare System Oncology RN in Charlotte , North Carolina 
Oncology RN 
Location: Charlotte, NC, US, 28203 
Company: Carolinas HealthCare System 
Shift Details: LCI S. Tryon Occasional coverage at other sites as needed 
Standard Hours: 40.00 
Department Name: LCI Med Onc - Tryon 
Location: Carolinas Medical Center 
Location Details: M-F, Days (8-5pm). Potential to do 4-10s (7-5:30pm) after 90 days 
Job Summary 
Shift: M-F, Days (8-5pm). Potential to do 4-10s (7-5:30pm) after 90 days. 
Assesses and diagnosis patients in a practice setting. Identifies outcomes, implements treatment and coordinates care. Performs and assists with oncology and infusion related treatments, therapies, and procedures. 
Essential Functions 
Identifies expected outcomes for patients' individualized treatment plan. 
Implements identified treatment plan and coordinates all aspects of care delivery. 
Provides education and counseling to patient and family members regarding identified health needs, health care activities, immunization requirements, medication effects and contraindications. 
Meets specific clinical needs of oncology and infusion patients by using knowledge and expertise. 
Recognizes medication mid solution incompatibilities and factors affecting stability. 
Performs facility acuity coding by selecting the appropriate level of service for a diverse patient population, ensures that all pertinent clinical information is documented in the patient's medical record and supports the level of service selected. 
Physical Requirements 
Work requires walking, standing, sitting, lifting, reaching, bending, pushing and pulling. Work requires lifting 75 pounds. Must speak English fluently and in understandable terms. Must possess an intact sense of sight, hearing, smell, touch, and finger dexterity. Must have the ability to concentrate. Must be able to respond quickly to changes in patient and/or clinic conditions. 
Education, Experience and Certifications 
Graduate from an accredited School of Nursing required. Current licensure to practice as a Registered Nurse or temporary license as a Registered Nurse Petitioner in the state of North Carolina required. Oncology experience preferred. Proficiency in IV therapy, bone marrow, spinals, thoracenteses, paracenteses and phlebotomy preferred. Oncology certification preferred. Basic Life Support for Healthcare Provider (BLS HCP) from AHA required. 
At Carolinas HealthCare System, our patients, communities and teammates are at the center of everything we do. Our commitment to diversity and inclusion allows us to deliver care that is superior in quality and compassion across our network of more than 900 care locations. 
As a leading, innovative health system, we promote an environment where differences are valued and integrated into our workforce. Our culture of inclusion and cultural competence allows us to achieve our goals and deliver the best possible experience to patients and the communities we serve.

thread.title: Stadtpolizei verzichtet auf automatische Nationalitätennennung
thread.title_full: Stadtpolizei verzichtet auf automatische Nationalitätennennung

posts.title: Stadtpolizei verzichtet auf automatische Nationalitätennennung
posts.text: Stadtpolizei verzichtet künftig auf automatische Nationalitätennennung Die Staatszugehörigkeit eines mutmasslichen Täters wird künftig von der Stadtpolizei Zürich nicht mehr automatisch mitgeteilt. Dies gab der Stadtrat Richard Wolff am Dienstagmorgen bekannt. Dominique Zeier 7.11.2017, 10:37 Uhr Stadtrat Richard Wolff verkündigt neue Weisung an die Stadtpolizei. (Bild: Ennio Leanza / Keystone) Vor zwei Jahren war beim Stadtrat ein Postulat der SP-Politikerin Min Li Marti und des GLP-Politikers Samuel Dubno eingegangen, in welchem sie forderten, in Medienmitteilungen auf die Nennung der Nationalitäten von Verdächtigen zu verzichten. Diese sei für die Beurteilung des Delikts nämlich genauso wenig aussagekräftig wie die Religion oder die sexuelle Orientierung der Täter. Stadtrat Richard Wolff hat das Postulat daraufhin geprüft und zwei Dinge geklärt: Erstens, wie wichtig es für das Verständnis einer Straftat ist, die Herkunft des Täters zu kennen und zweitens, ob die Nennung der Nationalität unerwünschte Wirkung hat. Wie die Sicherheitsdepartement der Stadt Zürich in einer Mitteilung schreibt, sei es für einzelne Medien wichtig, die Nationalität des Täters zu kennen. Es handle sich dabei um einen Fakt, der nicht verschwiegen werden dürfe. Die Nicht-Nennung sei ein Akt der Intransparenz und der Vertuschung. Allerdings müsse, so die Mitteilung, mitbedacht werden, dass die Nennung der Nationalität nur vermeintlich der Transparenz diene. Durch die Nennung der Nationalität werde suggeriert, dass sich die Tat dadurch ein Stück weit erklären lasse. Die eigentlichen Ursachen für die kriminellen Handlungen seien aber ganz andere, beispielsweise Armut, ein tiefes Bildungsniveau, Stigmatisierung in der Schweiz, eine Mutprobe, mangelnde soziale Kontrolle, Kriegstraumata, Drogenkonsum und andere. Neue Weisung Wissenschaftlich gut untersucht sei die Wirkung von Kriminalitätsberichterstattung auf das Weltbild der Medienkonsumenten. Personen, die häufig über kriminelle Ausländer in den Medien lesen, schätzen den Anteil der Ausländer an den Kriminellen deutlich höher ein, als er in Wirklichkeit ist. Es komme also zu einer Vorverurteilung von Menschen mit einem gewissen Hintergrund. Laut Stadtrat Wolff ist dies ein unerwünschte Effekt. Um einen Entscheid zu fällen, hat das Sicherheitsdepartement den Präsidenten des Schweizerischen Presserates, Medienethik-Dozenten der ZHAW und des Medienausbildungszentrums in Luzern MAZ und sechs Chefredaktoren befragt, nämlich jene der NZZ, des Tages-Anzeigers, der SRF, von 20 Minuten, Watson und der Blick-Gruppe. Die beiden Medienethiker und der Presseratspräsident hielten die heutige Praxis, also die regelmässige und unbesehene Nennung der Nationalität in der Kriminalitätsberichterstattung, für unsachlich und in der Tendenz diskriminierend. Drei Chefredaktoren haben sich dieser Aussage grundsätzlich angeschlossen, während drei widersprechen.
